Author: jakeson_90
EnhancedContent:
I’m happy to share that I passed the AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator exam on September 28, 2025, with a score of 865/1000. I began my preparation on July 10, 2025, mainly using Microsoft Learn modules, hands-on practice in Azure, and practice questions from SkillCertExams. The practice sets really helped me get familiar with scenario-based questions and time management.

I received my official result on September 30, 2025, and I can say the effort was worth it. My advice: focus on understanding how Azure services connect, take practice tests under timed conditions, and carefully review every mistake. Good luck to everyone.
Title: Passed AZ-104 Exam in 2025 with Practice Questions
Description:
I’m happy to share that I passed the AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator exam on September 28, 2025, with a score of 865/1000. I began my preparation on July 10, 2025, mainly using Microsoft Learn modules, hands-on practice in Azure, and practice questions from SkillCertExams. The practice sets really helped me get familiar with scenario-based questions and time management.

I received my official result on September 30, 2025, and I can say the effort was worth it. My advice: focus on understanding how Azure services connect, take practice tests under timed conditions, and carefully review every mistake. Good luck to everyone.
